top10.joke: Why do hippies love corduroy? Because it's groovy man.
I used to hate facial hair, but it grew on me.
What do you call a bundle of hay in a church? Christian Bale.
I'm afraid for the calendar. Its days are numbered.
*With a pirate voice* Wha'ts a pirates favorite letter? R? RRRRR One might think, however, it would actually be the C!
Have you ever tried to make a belt out of wrist watches? It's a waist of time.
A pony with a cough is just a little horse.
My wife said I should do lunges to stay in shape. That would be a big step forward.
Why did the bicycle fall over? It was two tired.
How do you fix a broken pizza? With tomato paste.
